db-schema.users: CREATE TABLE users (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, username TEXT, password_hash TEXT, score INTEGER, access INTEGER, email TEXT, joined DATE, visited DATE);
db-schema.anons: CREATE TABLE anons (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, ip TEXT, useragent TEXT, score INTEGER, access INTEGER, email TEXT, joined DATE, visited DATE);
db-schema.votes: CREATE TABLE voteups (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, postid INTEGER, userid INTEGER, value INTEGER);
db-schema.posts: CREATE TABLE posts (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, filename TEXT, filepath TEXT, hash TEXT, size INTEGER, score INTEGER, tags TEXT, userid INTEGER, anonid INTEGER, posted DATE);
db-schema.sessions: CREATE TABLE sessions (hash TEXT, userid INTEGER, added DATE);
